title: 01/19/22 DPS Hour 2 Peter Schrager
itunes:title: 01/19/22 DPS Hour 2 Peter Schrager
description:
Peter Schrager talks to Dan about the upcoming playoff matchups. Peter says he is sticking with his Super Bowl pick: the Chiefs against the Rams.
